title: NFL Draft Rumors: Smoke or Fire, Vikings vs. Jaguars, Harrison HOF?
description:
Pete Prisco joins Will Brinson to discuss the retirement of James Harrison and whether or not he's a future Hall of Famer, the Vikings giving Eric Kendricks a new contract and whether Pete would take the Vikings or Jaguars defense, the Broncos releasing CJ Anderson and where he might land. Then the guys play a game of SMOKE OR FIRE with the latest NFL Draft rumors, wondering how far Saquon Barkley could slip in the draft, if Josh Rosen could fall, whether the Patriots are interested in Lamar Jackson and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
